text: Tiandao (; Vietnamese: Thiên Đạo, Japanese: Tendō) is a Chinese word used in many philosophical and religious contexts in China and the Sinosphere. It can also refer specifically to: * Tao, often referred to as Tiandao, is an important concept passed down from ancient Chinese thinkers to the present day. * Cheondoism，also known by the name Tiandao as the Chinese reading of its name
title: Tiandao
